@AlaskaAir Threw us off a plane because my whiskers on my chin pulled my mask down when I talked. They said “well, you shouldn’t have talked.” Im still beside myself. My friend missed a funeral because of the UNFAIR alleged “noncompliance”.

Our flight to NYC was delayed almost 2 hours. I forgot to pack a headset that would work with the plane’s entertainment system. I have not eaten since 6 AM bc I refuse to take off this mask until we land & are safe in our hotel rm. OTOH, free WiFi on the plane is pretty sweet.
